QuestData.Title: Archaedas, The Ancient Stone Watcher
QuestData.Description: The true goal in Uldaman is to obtain the Discs of Norgannon. These platinum discs could grant our order unbelievable power. Countless secrets of the Makers are inscribed on them...their value is beyond any material wealth you could possibly imagine.$B$BThe only problem in obtaining them is that Archaedas, an ancient and powerful creation of the Makers, guards the discs with a venerable army at his disposal. I need you to defeat him and secure the discs for The Reliquary.
QuestData.RewardText: You are a most reliable agent, $N. Proceed to the discs and learn all you can. Report back to me immediately after.
